Text.Name: LsPandaXian
Text.PossibleMagic.0.Desc: Consumes its own Growth and Intelligence to invite an animal to join your sect.\n[color=#FF0000]Requires at least 50 Intelligence.[/color]
Text.PossibleMagic.1.Desc: Consumes its own Growth and Nutrition to go to another sect and largely improve its relation with your sect.\n[color=#FF0000]Requires it to be mature. [/color]
